items.name: e-paper
descriptions: look:It appears to be a small divice that has somebody's logs written on it.

read:Sol: 3548.To whom it may concern, my name is Isenhower Hindinberg. I am this ship's computer scientist. I just finished coding Zoink AI, an artificial intelligence robot. My hope is that he will be able to keep me and the crew safe during our hundred or so year hyperspace travel to planet Primus, to start a new research settelment. My only worry is that if he attains super-intelligence levels, only God may help us then...

items.name: chamber pot
descriptions: look:It looks like a silver bowl that holds some brown liquid inside.  Ew... It's starting to smell...
